title: American Truck Car Driving
fullContent: Homeâ€º DrivingAmerican Truck Car DrivingBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenThe main mission in American Truck Car Driving is to drive on the amazing highways, carrying important cargo to the final destination. With the help of the arrows you will be able to guide your truck to a specific area.Be careful not to hit your car in the traffic. On your way you will find gas station to fuel or repair your truck.Of course you can customize the truck changing the car color, window color and smoke color.American Truck Car Driving Controls:Use arrow keys and mouse to control the truckThis article was updated on January 15, 20241 Player3DCarDrivingFreeSimulatorTruck
